abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews premiere of Anna Sperber dance piece ForeverandaDay at the Kitchen.
snippet: Anna Sperber presented her new choreography, “ForeverandaDay,” at the Kitchen.
lead_paragraph: Anna Sperber presented her new choreography, “ForeverandaDay,” at the Kitchen.

headline.main: Continuing to Play With the Tension Between Formality and Wildness
headline.print_headline: Continuing to Play With the Tension Between Formality and Wildness
headline.seo: Anna Sperber’s ‘ForeverandaDay’ at the Kitchen - Review
